title: Crappy typeface request
content:
Anyone know this (crappy) font? I need to identify it to recreate the logo (client request). It may be a little distorted, but if you know it, I'd appreciate it.

thanks,  
-Troy

Font: 

 Curlz 

Solved By: 

 [oldnick](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415051025/http:/typophile.com/user/6470 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [montegobay\_nameonly1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415051025/http:/typophile.com/files/montegobay_nameonly1.jpg) | 675.45 KB |
author: Ruprecht

comments.content: This is what I've come to call "craptastic"--so crappy it's fantastic.

They used to call it camp! It's not so much that the font is crappy but this particular use is a bit over the top. If the interior of this place is like the logo, then I don't think I would last more than a few seconds...
